title: Second Life Chance of the B Class Villain - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Shounen   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Age Regression   Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Evil Protagonist   Hunters   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Second Chance   Tragic Past
author: 수르코프
description:
B-class villain Lee Si-guk, gained superhuman powers in a world where fantasy became reality.

Due to an unlucky event, he was caught by the authorities and sent to death sentence at the age of thirty-eight.

With all his abilities and memories, he returned to 2017, when he was thirteen, and still in the sixth grade of elementary school.

‘I’m not going to live like that this time.’>
